name: Lucky's Adventure
description:
Lucky's Adventure is a Dinosaur themed platformer. Take Lucky the parasaurolophus and her dinosaur friend on an adventure through the games many levels. You can collect coins to buy new dino friends to play as and while you travel through the levels you may encounter new creatures that will aid you in completing each level. 

Lucky's Adventure is a game based on Italic Pigs upcoming game Paleo Pines. This game was created for their community wide creative contest. This game was a solo project created in only a month.
